sk1.name: Blade Fury
sk1.desc: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Lasts 5 seconds.

sk2.name: Healing Ward
sk2.desc: Summons a Healing Ward that heals all nearby allied units, based on their max hit points. The Healing Ward can move at 450 movement speed after being summoned. Lasts 25 seconds.

sk3.name: Blade Dance
sk3.desc: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.

sk4.name: Omnislash
sk4.desc: Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 175-250 damage per slash. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
